actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the look-back method shall not apply to construction contracts required to use the percentage of completion method.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to prescribe that the look-back method shall not apply to any construction contract and to any other contract required to use the percentage of completion method.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the look-back method shall not apply to construction contracts required to use the percentage of completion method.
